targets.annotation: ABI40 - ABA-Insensitive 4-like / ABI4-related transcription factor (AP2/ERF family; dormancy maintenance)
HEX6 - Hexokinase 6 (dual-function glucose sensor and glycolytic enzyme; sugar sensing / ABA crosstalk)
PRX91 - Class III peroxidase 91 (secretory/apoplastic; ROS generation/scavenging, cell wall cross-linking)
NPF15 - NRT1/PTR Family 6.3-like transporter (nitrate/peptide/hormone transporter)
AHL9 - AT-hook motif nuclear-localized protein 9 (chromatin architectural factor; negative regulator of organ elongation)
RING63 - RING-type E3 ubiquitin ligase (C3H2C3/RING-H2 type; targets growth-promoting proteins for degradation)
RING265 - RING-type E3 ubiquitin ligase (C3HC4 type; selective proteolysis of growth-related substrates)
ppr377 - Pentatricopeptide repeat protein 377 (P-type; organelle-targeted; mitochondrial/chloroplast RNA processing)
CYP10 - Cytochrome P450 family member (CYP71/CYP72 clade; possible GA/BR catabolism)
MYBR64 - MYB-related transcription factor 64 (ABA response; stomatal regulation; growth suppressor under stress)
IBP1 - Bowman-Birk type trypsin inhibitor / stress-responsive protease inhibitor
LOC100273360 - Uncharacterized protein; predicted DUF domain-containing, possible membrane protein
PRH130 - Proline-rich protein / extensin-like cell wall structural protein
si614021b09a - Uncharacterized protein; possible small regulatory peptide or ncRNA-associated locus
PCO145926 - Uncharacterized / predicted oxidoreductase (based on remote homology; possibly redox-related)
IDP8263 - Indeterminate domain protein / uncharacterized protein with predicted zinc finger (possibly transcriptional regulation)
AI714716 - EST tag; best hit to DUF642 domain protein (cell wall-associated; pectin modification)
F-box/kelch repeat protein (SCF complex; ubiquitin-proteasome pathway)
Predicted RNA-binding protein (RRM domain; post-transcriptional RNA regulation / mRNA stability)
Predicted serine/threonine protein kinase (receptor-like kinase; stress perception / signal transduction)
